Creative Commons Resource Archive

Six licenses for sharing your work

Download

Repository

Simple, quick introduction to Creative Commons licenses. Available either as a single page or as a folded brochure.

  • Arabic (Egyptian): flat folded
  • English: flat folded
  • Japanese: flat folded
  • Korean: flat folded
  • Luganda: flat folded
  • Mongolian: flat folded
  • Romanian: flat folded
  • Tagalog: flat folded


To the extent possible under law, Creative Commons has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to Six licenses for sharing your work.
